help-file.title: DISARM
help-file.content:
Syntax: disarm <victim> <object>
"Disarm" provides a chance of knocking an opponent's weapon (or other object) from its hands. The chance of success is exceedingly small when applied to mobs and larger when used against player characters. If you successfully disarm your opponent's weapon, it will drop the weapon and fight in hand-to-hand combat. But, if you fail, you may fumble your own weapon.
